mapper.select: select a.user_id ,a.platform_id ,c.value as platform_name ,ifnull(a.user_real_name,'') as user_real_name ,ifnull(a.user_login_name,'') as user_login_name ,ifnull(a.nickname,'') as nickname ,ifnull(b.value,'') as gender ,ifnull(DATE_FORMAT(a.birthdate,'%Y-%m-%d'),'') as birthdate ,ifnull(a.phone,'') as phone ,ifnull(a.address,'') as address ,ifnull(a.mail_address,'') as mail_address ,ifnull(a.user_status,'') as user_status ,ifnull(a.remark,'') as remark ,ifnull(a.create_time,'') as create_time ,ifnull(a.create_date,'') as create_date ,ifnull(a.is_delete,'') as is_delete ,ifnull(a.create_timestamp,'') as create_timestamp from user_info a left join dictionary b on a.gender = b.code and b.p_code = 'gender' and b.language = #{language} left join dictionary c on a.platform_id = c.code and c.p_code = 'platform' and c.language = #{language } where a.user_id = #{user_id }

select user_id ,platform_id ,user_real_name ,user_login_name ,user_password ,phone ,mail_address ,user_status ,remark ,create_time ,create_date ,salt from user_info where is_delete='0' and phone=#{phone} and platform_id=#{platform_id}
select user_id from user_info where is_delete='0' and phone=#{phone}
